/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a pedestrian standing on the sidewalk, immersed in the city's vibrant atmosphere. The street, lined with towering buildings, stretches out ahead, leading the eye towards the horizon. A red bus and a white car add splashes of color to the scene, hinting at the city's dynamic pace of life. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a serene contrast to the urban landscape below. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being enveloped by the cityscape.
